CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 14, 1958, pg. B6, reads: "ELDRIGE M. HUNTER, high school physical education teacher, of Savannah, Ga., received his Master of Education Degree"
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Eldridge M. Hunter wearing dark cap and gown and light colored stole, after receiving Master of Education Degree, at University of Pittsburgh graduation
